titleStmt.title: A brief account of the tryal of Peter Cooke, esq; who was tryed before the Lord Chief Justice Treby, &c. At the Sessions-House in the Old Baily, on Wednesday, May 13. 1696. for high treason.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace (Middlesex)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
